Hi,I am Somnath hansda
I am an Illustrator artist!! Illustration is the art of making images that work with something and add to it without needing direct attention and without distracting from what they illustrate. The other thing is the focus of the attention, and the illustration's role is to add personality and character without competing with that other thing.
Also I am a Phtographer!! “Photography is my passion - nature is my refuge. Combine the two, and that is where I am most at peace.”
